text: [[b]]Lady Liu[[/b]]\\nDevoted Mother\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lady Liu constantly worries about her family. Perhaps she worries too much.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Lady Liu[[/b]]\\nDevoted Mother\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lady Liu constantly worries about her family. Perhaps she worries too much.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lu Zheng[[/b]]\\nScout of Taiyuan\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]She transforms the sound of her bow and movement of her troops into a violent and beautiful song and dance.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lu Zheng[[/b]]\\nScout of Taiyuan\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]She transforms the sound of her bow and movement of her troops into a violent and beautiful song and dance.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lu Zheng[[/b]]\\nScout of Taiyuan\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]She transforms the sound of her bow and movement of her troops into a violent and beautiful song and dance.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Dong Min[[/b]]\\nGreedy Tyrant\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Dong Min understands the unwritten rules of politics - one can never possess too much power.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Dong Peishan[[/b]]\\nEmpress Dong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Dong Peishan is greedy, but ever cautious in her conduct. If it’s Dong Zhou you’re after, you must outwit the cunning Dong Peishan first"[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lady Wu[[/b]]\\nEmpress Wulie\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]No matter how brave the warrior, they cannot hope to match the power of her dignity and generosity.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yan Xiang[[/b]]\\nSagacious Seer\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Blessed with prodigious foresight, Yan Xiang forsees perils and pitfalls long before they arise.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Ma Yunlu[[/b]]\\nPrincess Dun Huang\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Ma Yunlu prefers small elite units than a large force. For her well equipped and highly skilled troops, she spares no expense.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Ma Yunlu[[/b]]\\nPrincess Dun Huang\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Ma Yunlu prefers small elite units than a large force. For her well equipped and highly skilled troops, she spares no expense.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Ma Yunlu[[/b]]\\nPrincess Dun Huang\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Ma Yunlu prefers small elite units than a large force. For her well equipped and highly skilled troops, she spares no expense.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Hua Lanli[[/b]]\\nArcher of the West\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Hua Lanli’s archery skills are outstanding - drawing comparisons to the ancient hero Hou Yi, the Lord Archer himself.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Hua Lanli[[/b]]\\nArcher of the West\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Hua Lanli’s archery skills are outstanding - drawing comparisons to the ancient hero Hou Yi, the Lord Archer himself.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Hua Lanli[[/b]]\\nArcher of the West\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Hua Lanli’s archery skills are outstanding - drawing comparisons to the ancient hero Hou Yi, the Lord Archer himself.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lady Feng[[/b]]\\nWeeping Woman\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Jealous of Lady Feng’s preferential treatment and beauty, the concubines have made her cry in front of Yuan Shu numerous times.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lady Feng[[/b]]\\nWeeping Woman\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Jealous of Lady Feng’s preferential treatment and beauty, the concubines have made her cry in front of Yuan Shu numerous times.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yuan Anyang[[/b]]\\nPrincess Zhong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The beauty and qualities of Yuan Anyang, a princess of the Kingdom of Zhong, are known throughout the land.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yuan Anyang[[/b]]\\nPrincess Zhong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The beauty and qualities of Yuan Anyang, a princess of the Kingdom of Zhong, are known throughout the land.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yuan Anyang[[/b]]\\nPrincess Zhong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The beauty and qualities of Yuan Anyang, a princess of the Kingdom of Zhong, are known throughout the land.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Xun[[/b]]\\nGeneral-in-Chief of Zhong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]As the leading general of the Kingdom of Zhong, Zhang Xun commands the formidable army of the Yuan family.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Xun[[/b]]\\nGeneral-in-Chief of Zhong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]As the leading general of the Kingdom of Zhong, Zhang Xun commands the formidable army of the Yuan family.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Luo Jun[[/b]]\\nGuardian of the People\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]"There is nothing to be gained from oppressing the people; they, ultimately, will decide our legacy."[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Luo Jun[[/b]]\\nGuardian of the People\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]"There is nothing to be gained from oppressing the people; they, ultimately, will decide our legacy."[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Hou Jinting[[/b]]\\nBrilliant Matriarch\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The stakes are raised on the fringes of the empire; Hou Jinting’s keen intuition and vigilance safeguards the future of her family.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Hou Jinting[[/b]]\\nBrilliant Matriarch\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The stakes are raised on the fringes of the empire; Hou Jinting’s keen intuition and vigilance safeguards the future of her family.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lü Ji[[/b]]\\nDaughter of the Dragon\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Much is expected from the Warrior Without Equal’s daughter, but the ravishing Lü Ji fights with both the skill and ferocity to live up to the Lü name.[[/col]][[/i]]

Horse Breeding / Foraging & Supplies
[[b]]Horse Breeding[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] Ferghana horses are bred to equip cavalry forces. [[/col]][[/i]]
The finer your horses, the more powerful your cavalry will be.
[[b]]Encamp[[/b]] is a stance for armies that allow them to set up a more permanent camp.\\n\\n[[b]]Food[[/b]] is used to establish bigger settlements.
[[b]]Military supplies[[/b]] allow an army to stay in fighting condition and will have an impact on [[b]]replenishment[[/b]] and [[b]]morale[[/b]].
• Improve cavalry units
• Armies forage food when encamped
• Increases military supplies bonus

[[b]]Sell Horses[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Economic assignment[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Income from commerce\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Your attendant will sell the horses you've bred, for a fine sum.[[/col]][[/i]]
Black Mountain / Opportunistic Alignment
[[b]]Black Mountain[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] Black Mountain bandits exploit the chaos to bolster their numbers. [[/col]][[/i]]
As the Black Mountain bandits increase in number, the more brazen they become.

[[b]]Yellow Turban[[/b]] factions are seen as outlaws and diplomacy with them is normally [[b]]restricted[[/b]]. Zhang Yan can [[b]]improve relations[[/b]] with Yellow Turbans and can align himself with them.
In an [[b]]ambush[[/b]], the defending force is attacked from both sides while marching in column, leaving the attacker to choose the best time to strike.
• Can improve unique units
• Can improve relations with Yellow Turbans
• Can ambush when attacking

[[b]]Local Nobles[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Add-on building[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Available Local Noble units \\n [[col:green]]+[[/col]] Replenishment \\n [[col:red]]+[[/col]] Corruption \\n\\n [[col:flavour]][[i]]The local elites. They can be helpful or harmful to you.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Mercenary Outpost[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Add-on building[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]Grants access to Mercenaries[[/col]]\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Income from commerce\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Replenishment\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Without inheriting authority, wealth's greatest use is for attaining power, so the brave can serve China regardless of their heritage.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Captain Retinues[[/b]]\\n\\nInstead of heroic characters, House of Yuan can employ lower-ranked officers and captains who lead retinues of various unit compositions.\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Leading their men as first amongst equals, captains will follow your orders without hesitation.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Friendly with Qiang tribe[[/b]]\\n\\n [[col:flavour]][[i]]This faction is friendly with the Qiang. The negative effects of Qiang settlements are mitigated.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Friendly with Shan Yue Tribes[[/b]]\\n\\n [[col:flavour]][[i]]This faction is friendly with the Shanyue. The negative effects of Shanyue settlements are mitigated.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Can ambush when attacking[[/b]]\\n\\n [[col:flavour]][[i]]This faction can ambush when attacking.[[/col]][[/i]]
Stratocracy / Military Government
[[b]]Stratocracy[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] An inevitable rule to stabilize the turmoil. [[/col]]
Gain military benefits at the expense of the relations with other factions.
The [[b]]court[[/b]] consists of characters in special government posts that have important effects on your faction.
[[b]]Administrator[[/b]] is a position within your government. An administrator oversees the local government in a commandery and provides certain bonuses to these lands.
[[b]]Garrisoned armies[[/b]] are armies stationed in a settlement. These will be defending the city in case of an attack and join the local garrison.
• Military Improvements
• Unique military inspector court positions
• Limits the availability of administrators
• Garrisoned armies provide construction bonus and income bonus
Yan Baihu can recruit generic [[b]]Han units[[/b]] with Bandit Network.
• Can recruit generic Han units
Fortitude / Trophy Cabinet

[[b]]Fortitude[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] With bravery and discipline, Liu Chong inspires his men and puts fear into the enemies of the imperial palace. [[/col]][[/i]] \\n\\n
Increase your [[b]]fortitude[[/b]] through [[b]]winning battles[[/b]], and by inflicting greater [[b]]casualties[[/b]] upon [[b]]enemy forces[[/b]] than they inflict upon yours.
Whether from the bodies of fallen enemies, or awarded for gallant behaviour, these [[b]]trophies[[/b]] reward an [[b]]aggressive approach[[/b]] to this faction.
[[b]]Trophies[[/b]] can be displayed in the [[b]]trophy cabinet[[/b]]. Each [[b]]trophy[[/b]] provides a bonus whilst it is on display.
• Increases unit morale and Decreases enemy unit morale
• Acquires trophies from achievements
• Can place trophies on display for unique effects
